title: Russia Probe Expands with Raid on Manafort's Home (Audio)
itunes:title: Russia Probe Expands with Raid on Manafort's Home (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Bradley Moss, a partner at Mark Zaid PLC, discusses the raid on the home of former Trump Campaign Manager, Paul Manafort, as special counsel Robert Mueller expands his investigation. He speaks with Greg Stohr on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
